column4: When I open my synaptic up, I get this error message: W: Couldn't stat source package list http://security.ubuntu.com hoary-security/universe Packages (/var/lib/apt/lists/security.ubuntu.com_ubuntu_dists_hoary-security_universe_binary-amd64_Packages) - stat (2 No such file or directory)
Any ideas how to fix this?

Okay, I'll try again: how to fix this: W: Couldn't stat source package list http://security.ubuntu.com hoary-security/universe Packages (/var/lib/apt/lists/security.ubuntu.com_ubuntu_dists_hoary-security_universe_binary-amd64_Packages) - stat (2 No such file or directory)
